Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.repository

Interface StatsTeamRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<StatsTeam>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<StatsTeam,Integer>
@Repository public interface StatsTeamRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<StatsTeam,Integer>
This interface represents the repository for managing StatsTeam entities. It extends the JpaRepository interface provided by Spring Data JPA.

  • Method Details

    • findByTeamAndSeason

      StatsTeam findByTeamAndSeason(Team team, int season)
      Retrieves the StatsTeam entity for a specific team and season.
      Parameters:
      team - The team for which to retrieve stats.
      season - The season for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      The StatsTeam entity for the specified team and season or null if not found.

    • findDataTeamByIdTeamAndSeason

      @Query(value="SELECT st.points, st.totReb, st.assists, st.fgm,st.ftm,st.tpm FROM statsteam st WHERE idTeam=:inputIdTeam AND season=:inputSeason", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer[]> findDataTeamByIdTeamAndSeason(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Retrieves the team statistics for a specific team and season.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - The ID of the team for which to retrieve stats.
      season - The season for which to retrieve stats.
      Returns:
      List of Integer arrays representing the team statistics. [Points, Total Rebounds, Assists, Field Goals Made, Free Throws Made, Three-Pointers Made]

    • findDataAvgNba

      @Query(value="SELECT AVG(st.points), AVG(st.totReb), AVG(st.assists), AVG(st.fgm), AVG(st.ftm) ,AVG(st.tpm) FROM statsteam st WHERE idTeam!=:inputIdTeam AND season=:inputSeason", nativeQuery=true) List<Float[]> findDataAvgNba(@Param("inputIdTeam") int idTeam, @Param("inputSeason") int season)
      Retrieves the average team statistics for all teams except a specific team in a given season.
      Parameters:
      idTeam - The ID of the team to exclude from the average calculation.
      season - The season for which to calculate average team statistics.
      Returns:
      List of Float arrays representing the average team statistics. [Average Points, Average Total Rebounds, Average Assists, Average Field Goals Made, Average Free Throws Made, Average Three-Pointers Made]

    • findDistinctTeamIds

      @Query(value="SELECT st.idTeam FROM StatsTeam st WHERE st.season=:season GROUP BY st.idTeam", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findDistinctTeamIds(@Param("season") Integer season)
      Retrieves a list of distinct team IDs for a specific season.
      Parameters:
      season - The season for which to retrieve distinct team IDs.
      Returns:
      List of distinct team IDs for the specified season.

    • findDistincSeasonsWhereIsNotComplete

      @Query(value="SELECT st.season FROM StatsTeam st WHERE st.rankConference IS NOT NULL GROUP BY st.idTeam; ", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> findDistincSeasonsWhereIsNotComplete()
      Retrieves a list of distinct seasons where team rankings are not complete.
      Returns:
      List of distinct seasons where team rankings are not complete.
